title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4207.12 - Man, horse, ambulances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4207.12 - Man, horse, ambulances

State Regulations

Racing associations shall furnish and maintain at least
one man ambulance and at least one horse ambulance each day that their tracks
may be open for racing or exercising horses, equipped ready for immediate duty, and to be placed at an entrance to the racing strip so that no time may be lost
in answering calls. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4207.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
